page.title: 03ROCOL, SWILLINGTON
page.content: The{Ragosine Oil Company Ltd.}has been producing specialist oils,greases and lubricants in Swillington for over 30 years.Their products are used by the{engineering industry and on {aircraft, satellites and missiles.} Rocol employs about 275 people in the U.K., 200 of these being employed at the Swillington headquarters, many of whom live in the village and surrounding areas. Rocol is a very successful company, having recently acquired a piece of land from the nearby Armitage's brick works to extend their factory. One of their most useful products is a special line-marking paint called Easy-line for use on car parks, sports fields, etc.
